column5: [QUOTE=EckohltI would just make one stop for beer and just have walleye n bacon for breakfast,sounds good to me.[/QUOTE]Eck,You must becoming more compassionate or slowly down as I’m shocked you would even let anyone stop even to piss once you cleared the border as I know full speed ahead to the lake as you are ready to slay ‘em
The guys pay me big money to stop,pays for half my trip.Stop at casino on the way up and win big,so there's always cash coming in on the way up fishing.

Typically my group stops at the LCBO and picks up an extra case of beer. This year we will need eggs too. Does anyone know if we can get both beer and eggs at the Beaver Mills Market? Or will we need to make two stops?Thanks!
I would just make one stop for beer and just have walleye n bacon for breakfast,sounds good to me.
Two stops. Beer (and all alcohol) are through the LCBO (and/or Beer Store) only.
That’s what I thought but wanted it confirmed. Appreciate it!
I like the way you think but I would like to have some eggs with it. We joke all the time that our diet the week we are in Canada would be a dietitians perfect example…of what not to do.
When in the area, I stop on hwy in Emo for beer, etc, then again stop several hundred feet west at the large grocery store. Bill
Agree.it be kinda tough to go through the week without eggs,good luck on the trip and that goes to everyone!

The grocery store by Morson has beer and liquor the grocery store on 105 by Perreault falls has beer and liquor not sure if your going by them. But beavers mills does not. We stop at both in Rainy River don't take long. Now that the one in morson has booze we may just make one stop there.

I assume you are talking about J&J General Store on the east side of the road? If so, that’s good to know. We will be driving right by there on our way to Mylie’s. Justin posted on Facebook after I started this thread that he will have eggs for sale at the lodge. Might just get them from him. Easier for us and after Covid, the lodges can use all the revenue they can get.Appreciate the tip!Hook_settr
Yeap the new one on the east side. No kokanee but I get gibsons finest whiskey. Nice place with a good selection.
